name: Overkill, Shadows Fall & Hypocrisy music
description: This is a full Doom and Doom 2 music replacement with tracks from the heavy metal artists Overkill, Shadows Fall and Hypocrisy. All tracks have been replaced and both games have some different tracks. The original MIDIs used in the file can be found over at http://en.midimelody.ru/category/midi-melodies/ under their respective artist names.
